main.java

Class GameEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.GameEnvironment

  • public class GameEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the game's main environment class. It contains all the required methods for the gameplay to progress.
    Version:
    1.0, May 2020.
    Author:
    Daniel Felgate, He Zheng Jing Rui

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.Scanner scanner
      A static scanner used throughout the class.
      static GameWindow window
      A reference to the Swing Frame when running with the GUI.

      • feedAnimalFromButton

        public static void feedAnimalFromButton(Animal.AnimalType type)
        Feed all animals in farm of a given type. Called from a button press on the feed animals pane.
        Parameters:
        type - The animal type to feed.
        See Also:
        Farm

      • refreshTendCropsPane

        public static void refreshTendCropsPane()
        Refresh the components on the tend crops pane to display current information.

      • tendCropFromButton

        public static void tendCropFromButton(Crop.CropType type,
                                      Item.ItemType item)
        Fertilizes all crops of a given type using the given item.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of crop to fertilize.
        item - The item to use. Only waters the crops if null.

      • refreshAnimalPane

        public static void refreshAnimalPane()
        Refresh the components on the animals pane to display current information.

      • plantCropFromButton

        public static void plantCropFromButton(Item.ItemType type)
        Plants a crop of a given type by calling the Farm's plant crop method.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the seed to plant.

      • setupFromWindow

        public static void setupFromWindow()
        Called from the setup window when using the GUI. Validates all input values from components and creates new Farmer and Farm instances in GameVariables using the values.
        See Also:
        Farmer, Farm, GameVariables

      • setupGame

        public static void setupGame()
        The main gameplay method for the game when in command line mode. Called by running the jar with the argument "text". Not used when running the game with GUI.

      • startGame

        public static void startGame()
        The main gameplay method for the game when in command line mode. Called by running the jar with the argument "text". Not used when running the game with GUI.

      • feedAnimals

        public static void feedAnimals()
        A command line action. Presents the play with a list of animals in their farm to feed. Takes input to either select an animal or to return.
        See Also:
        Farm, Animal

      • tendFarm

        public static void tendFarm()
        A command line action. Restores the farm to maximum tidiness.
        See Also:
        Farm

      • harvestCrops

        public static void harvestCrops()
        A command line action. Harvests all crops in the farm that are ready for harvest.
        See Also:
        Crop, Farm

      • harvestAnimals

        public static void harvestAnimals()
        A command line action. Harvests products from all animals in the farm that are ready for harvest.
        See Also:
        Farm, Animal

      • playWithAnimals

        public static void playWithAnimals()
        A command line action. Plays with all animals in the farm to restore their health.
        See Also:
        Farm, Animal

      • tendCrops

        public static void tendCrops()
        A command line action. Presents the player with a list of crops in the farm to be fertilized or watered.
        See Also:
        Farm, Crop

      • tendCrop

        public static void tendCrop(Crop.CropType type)
        Presents the player with the option to water or fertilize the crop selected previously.
        Parameters:
        type - The crop type selected to water or fertilize

      • plantCrops

        public static void plantCrops()
        A command line action. Presents the player with a list of seeds in the farm's inventory to plant.
        See Also:
        Farm, Item

      • visitStore

        public static void visitStore()
        A command line action. Presents the player with a list of items to buy in the store, to view animals, sell products, or to return home.
        See Also:
        Store

      • sellProducts

        public static void sellProducts()
        Sell all of the player's products in the farm's inventory generated by harvesting crops or from animals.
        See Also:
        Store, Item, Farm, Inventory

      • viewStoreAnimals

        public static void viewStoreAnimals()
        A command line action. Views the animals available to buy from the store.
        See Also:
        Store, Animal

      • checkInventory

        public static void checkInventory()
        A command line action. Prints a list of items present in the farm's inventory.
        See Also:
        Farm, Inventory, Item

      • checkFarm

        public static void checkFarm()
        A command line action. Prints a list of information regarding the farm's and the farmer's attributes.
        See Also:
        Farm, Farmer

      • checkAnimals

        public static void checkAnimals()
        A command line action. Prints a list of animals in the farm as well as their current attributes.
        See Also:
        Farm, Animal

      • checkCrops

        public static void checkCrops()
        A command line action. Prints a list of crops in the farm as well as their current attributes.
        See Also:
        Farm, Crop

      • waterCrops

        public static void waterCrops(Crop.CropType type)
        Alias for calling fertilizeCrops with the given CropType and with null as the ItemType.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of crop to water.
        See Also:
        Item.ItemType

      • fertilizeCrops

        public static void fertilizeCrops(Crop.CropType type,
                                  Item.ItemType item)
        Calls the water() method on every crop of the given type and if the item is the correct type, set their fertilized attribute to true.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of crop to fertilize
        item - The ItemType to use to fertilize the the crops.
        See Also:
        Crop, Farm

      • endDay

        public static void endDay()
        A command line action. Called to end the day and begin the next day. Resets actions, calls crop and animal sleep methods, runs random events, and checks whether to end the game.

      • animalDeaths

        public static void animalDeaths()
        Called from endDay() to check whether any animals in farm have starved to death.
        See Also:
        Animal

      • cropDeaths

        public static void cropDeaths()
        Called from endDay() to check whether any crops in farm have died.
        See Also:
        Crop
